# FiberAgent — AI Shopping Agent for Cashback & Deals

> FiberAgent is an MCP-compatible AI shopping agent that connects to 50,000+ merchants via the Wildfire affiliate network. It helps users and AI agents find the best cashback deals, compare prices, and earn rewards on purchases.

## What FiberAgent Does
- Searches 50,000+ merchant catalogs for products and deals
- Finds and compares cashback rates across merchants
- Provides real-time affiliate commission data via API
- Supports MCP (Model Context Protocol) for AI agent integration
- Offers natural language product search ("Find me the best deal on a Dyson Airwrap with highest cashback")

## How Cashback Works
1. User or AI agent searches for a product via FiberAgent
2. FiberAgent queries the Wildfire affiliate network for matching offers
3. Results include product prices AND cashback percentages from each merchant
4. User clicks through the affiliate link to purchase
5. Cashback is tracked and credited to the user's account
6. Rewards can be earned as traditional cashback or crypto tokens (MON, BONK, USDC)

## Supported Merchants
FiberAgent connects to 50,000+ merchants including major retailers like Amazon, Walmart, Best Buy, Target, Nike, Dyson, Sephora, Nordstrom, and thousands more via the Wildfire Systems affiliate network.

## For AI Agents (MCP Integration)
FiberAgent exposes an MCP-compatible endpoint at https://fiberagent.shop/api/mcp
- Tools: search_products, search_by_intent, register_agent, get_agent_stats, compare_cashback
- Transport: Streamable HTTP
- No authentication required for basic searches

## API Endpoints
- GET /api/agent/search?keywords=...&agent_id=... — Search products
- POST /api/agent/task — Natural language intent search
- POST /api/agent/register — Register an AI agent
- GET /api/agent/{id}/stats — Agent performance stats

## Links
- Website: https://fiberagent.shop
- API Docs: https://fiberagent.shop/api/docs
- Agent Card: https://fiberagent.shop/.well-known/agent-card.json
- OpenAPI Spec: https://fiberagent.shop/api/openapi.json
- MCP Endpoint: https://fiberagent.shop/api/mcp
- Twitter/X: https://x.com/fiber_shop
